citation.article-title: Reclassification of Rhodobium marinum and Rhodobium pfennigii as Afifella marina gen. nov. comb. nov. and Afifella pfennigii comb. nov., a new genus of photoheterotrophic Alphaproteobacteria and emended descriptions of Rhodobium, Rhodobium orientis and Rhodobium gokarnense.

p.s: Description of Afifella pfennigii comb. nov.
Afifella pfennigii (pfen.ni’gi.i. N.L. gen. n. pfennigii of Pfennig).
Basonym: Rhodobium pfennigii Caumette et al., 2007 [6].
The description is identical to that given for Rhodobium pfennigii by Caumette et al. [6].
The type strain shares the characteristics listed in the genus description.
Grows quite well under aerobic conditions with shaking in PYE medium supplemented with 3% sea water aquarium salts.
The type strain is AR2102T (=ATCC BAA-1145=DSM 17143).
